page.title: AngoraSix Pricing - Free and Plus Plans
page.description: Discover our pricing plans. Permanent Free plan and free Plus plan for Early Bird users. Reserve your access now!

header.title: Choose Your Plan
header.subtitle: Start free and scale when you're ready. Early Bird users get free access to the Plus Plan.

earlyBird.question: What does being an Early Bird mean?
earlyBird.answer: Early Bird users get permanent free access to the Plus Plan during the launch period. It's our way of thanking those who trust us from the beginning.

changePlan.question: Can I change plans later?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or change your plan anytime from your dashboard. Early Bird users will maintain their special benefits.
